text: Forgive me Ishernos, we must accept.
On another day, my ravens would pluck your eyes.
I seen no other path, as dark it is.
An offering to appease my vengeance.
Let me wash your armour while we discuss my proposal.
Light can shine even in the darkest of places.
May our differences not cause discord.
My ravens make more sense.
May you be forever lost in the mist.
Get out, before I strike you down and my ravens feast!
Speak, before I command my ravens to feed on your eyes.
Come, let me wash your armour while we speak.
You dare speak to me, the Murder Queen.
Go now with Ghyran’s blessings.
May my ravens guide you safely home.
Aid us as we have aided the world for so long.
Help us rid chaos from this world.
This serves both our causes.
Come stand on the shoulders of giants.
I have read the ravens entrails. It speaks of a dark omen.
Ishernos guides us elsewhere.
Unfortunately we can’t agree to that.
You are warmly received in the Raven court.
Mhorriníon the Murder Queen, welcomes you as friend.
The ravens caw in delight at your arrival.
The Raven Queen accepts.
We shall seal this deal before the altars of our gods.
May this forge our weapons in which to strike down chaos.
The crows grow jealous of your generosity
You have the Murder Queens blessings.
The ravens caw in delight.
I’ve sent ravens of these good tidings so all may revel.
May this be beginning of the end of chaos.
You will incur the wrath of the Murder Queen.
May ravens pluck your newborns from their cradles.
The ravens already told me of your treachery.
I will see revenge is served.
May ravens darken your skies.
You reject the Phantom Queen.
The ravens will feast well on your entrails.
You dare face the Raven Queen.
I will only cease when you have fallen.
I fear you work against us.
The Murder Queen, knows all.
The ravens speak of your misdeeds.
Let us rid this world of the shadows.
This maybe our only chance, surely you must see this.
Let our flocks join and wreak glorious havoc.
If not, we may falter and who do you think chaos will come for next.
The Murder Queen has a proposal.
My ravens wait for your answer?
What say you to the Phantom Queen?
This does not serve our interests.
The ravens speak of an ulterior motive in your proposal.
I Mhorriníon the Murder Queen, must decline.
Chaos surges, we must work together.
The ravens foretell of our doom, we must act now!
As one, we will destroy chaos.
Let us cease this fighting, there are others that incur my vengeance.
Surely you grow tired of the ravens.
There are others you must destroy if not to be destroyed.
The ravens circle, ready to feast.
May we fight and die alongside each other.
They will sing great songs and poems of our exploits.
So you may repent the corruption.
A gift to weather the storm.
The crows weeped as the gold left.
The ravens spoke of your arrival.
What have you to say to the Murder Queen.
May our fire warm you on this stormy eve.
Not until the ravens have your eyes.
Not until I see vengeance served.
I will rid your taint from this world.
It is not time to reunite Albion under one banner.
Rebuild the waystones and we will continue to shield you.
You must follow your own path.
My people flock to my banner to see your end.
You are tainted by chaos, therefore you must be destroyed.
I will slit your belly, your soldiers bellies and let the ravens feast on your entrails.
